cameraPermissionDialog.content: The {{appname}} requires the use of your camera to capture the {{passName}}
cameraPermissionDialog.title: Please allow camera use

footer.disclaimer: Il ne s'agit pas d'un site Web officiel du gouvernement. Pour plus d'informations sur le CovidPass, rendez-vous sur https://nzcp.covid19.health.nz
footer.privacy: The results of the scans are not shared to any entity; private, public, or governmental. No tracking whatsoever has been added to this site, if you find any issues, please email vaxxed@contrer.as

invalidCodes.expired: Sorry, it looks like you COVIDpass has expired. Please contact the [Ministry of Health]({{link}})
invalidCodes.invalid: Désolé, nous n'avons pas pu vérifier votre CovidPass. Veuillez contacter le [ministère de la Santé]({{link}})
invalidCodes.notAcovidPass: Sorry, this doesn't look to be a COVIDpass. Please contact the [Ministry of Health]({{link}})

verificationDialog.onlyForVerificationPurposes: Please use the results for verification purposes only. It's a good thing to respect everybody's privacy.
